title.rendered: “Israeli Air Force Strikes Hezbollah Terror Bases in Southern Lebanon: An In-Depth Report”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

Terror infrastructures, positions and military buildings; IDF attacked this morning in the Ramiya area in southern Lebanon

This morning, air force fighter jets attacked several terror infrastructures and military buildings of the Hezbollah terror organization in the village area of Ramiya in southern Lebanon.
The Hezbollah terror organization operates from the village area, which serves as a hub for the organization’s terror activities, surveillance and execution of terrorist actions.
Among other things, the organization fires at Israeli territory, exploiting the civilian population in the village area and using it as a human shield.

In addition, IDF forces attacked Hezbollah terror organization military positions in the areas of Amra and Al-Hiyam last night. One of the positions is located in an area from which anti-aircraft fire was directed at the Upper Galilee yesterday (Saturday).

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/3H2y3CM
